name: Reactants Sandbox
description:
V1 - Simple sand and wall spawn. You can also erase the "elements".

V2 - Added acid, fire, and wood. Fire does not work properly for the time being. No longer beta.

V3 - LARGE UPDATE! Improved eraser scaling, added water, ragdolls, borders, you can also change the time!

V4 - Fixed eraser and block scaling, adding bombs, moving ragdolls, and combat between the ragdolls! NOTICE: For right now, when a ragdoll dies, its joints with break apart and freeze in midair. I am still figuring out the gravity since it is a bit finicky.
